title: Deep Learning for Time Series Forecasting
description: Deep Learning for Time Series Forecasting The goal of this notebook is to develop and compare different approaches to time-series problems.Content: Time series visualization with ploty. How to transform a time series dataset into a supervised learning problem. How to develop a Multilayer Perceptron model for a univariate time series forecasting problem. How to develop a Convolutional Neural Network model for a univariate time series forecasting problem. How to develop a Long Short-Term Memory network model for a univariate time series forecasting problem. How to develop a Hybrid CNN-LSTM model for a univariate time series forecasting problem.  The content here was inspired by this article at machinelearningmastery.com, How to Get Started with Deep Learning for Time Series Forecasting (7-Day Mini-Course)Dependencies
